Chavonda Jacobs-Young (amụrụ 1967  ) bụ onye isi gọọmentị America  na-eje ozi dị ka onye nchịkwa nke Ọrụ nyocha Ugbo nke US Department of Agriculture's Agricultural Research Service
Ọrụ nyocha ọrụ ugbo bụ onye isi USDA, ụlọ ọrụ nyocha sayensị nke ụlọ nwere ndị sayensị otu puku na narị asatọ nakwa ụlọ nyocha iri itoolu n'ụwa niile
Jacobs-Young ka akpọrọ onye nchịkwa na February 2014; ọ bụ nwanyị mbụ na onye nwere agba na-edu ụlọ ọrụ ahụ
Na 1998, Jacobs-Young ghọrọ nwanyị Africa-American mbụ nwetara Ph.D
na akwụkwọ sayensị
Jacobs-Young bụ onye Augusta, Georgia
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Hephzibah High School na 1985
N'oge ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị na oge ya na North Carolina State University, o sonye na ihe omume dị elu ma bụrụ onye mmeri nke Atlantic Coast Conference ugboro atọ
Jacobs-Young nwetara nzere Bachelor nke Sayensị na sayensị akwụkwọ nakwa injinia (1989, NC State) nakwa nzere Masta nke Sayensị na sayensị osisi na akwụkwọ (1992, NC State)
Mgbe ahụ na 1998, ọ nwetara nzere Ph.D na sayensị akwụkwọ na North Carolina State University
N'afọ 2008, Jacobs-Young nwetara Asambodo Nduzi Ọha na mmejuputa iwu ọha site na Mahadum America dị na Washington, DC
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị Ph.D ya, ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka onye enyemaka Prọfesọ nke Sayensị akwụkwọ na Injinia na Mahadum Washington site na 1995 ruo 2002
Na 2002, a bịakwutere Jacobs-Young maka ịbanye na gọọmentị etiti
Ọ hụrụ ohere ịmụta banyere ọrụ gọọmenti etiti wee were ọrụ dị ka onye isi mmemme nke mba na nyocha, agụmakwụkwọ, nakwa Extension State Cooperative
N'ikpeazụ, ọ jere ozi dị ka onye isi nyocha amụma maka ọrụ ugbo na Office of Science and Technology Policy nke White House
N'ime ikike a, ọ kwadoro onye ndụmọdụ sayensị nke onye isi ala na ndị ọzọ nọ n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ndị isi nke Onye isi ala na ọrụ dị iche iche nke sayensị ugbo
Ọ na-arụ ọrụ n'ofe Gọọmenti Etiti iji kwalite imekọ ihe ọnụ na imekọ ihe ọnụ n'ihe gbasara sayensị kacha mkpa
Mgbe ọ laghachiri na USDA n'uju n'afọ 2010, Jacobs-Young nyere aka guzobe ma jee ozi dị ka onye isi onye isi nke nnyocha n'ụlọọrụ USDA
N'ebe ahụ, ọ kwadoro nhazi nke nduzi sayensị n'ofe Ngalaba ahụ ma hụ na ụkpụrụ kachasị elu nke ọgụgụ isi na iguzosi ike n'ezi ihe nke sayensị maka nyocha a na-agbasa site na ngalaba ahụ

Jacobs-Young jekwara ozi dị ka onye na-eme ihe nchịkwa maka National Institute of Food and Agriculture nke ụlọ ọrụ USDA tupu ọ banye na Ọrụ nyocha nke ọrụ ugbo na 2012 dị ka onye nchịkwa maka mmemme nyocha

Ọ bụ onye so na United States Senior Executive Service, onye otu American Association for the Advancement of Science, onye so na National Academy of Public Administration, na onye isi oche ọkwa onye mmeri

Na Machị 2022, a gụnyere Jacobs-Young na #IfThenSheCan - Ihe ngosi gburugburu National Mall n'ememe nke ọnwa akụkọ ihe mere eme ụmụ nwanyị; ihe ngosi ahụ nwere ihe oyiyi ruru otu narị na iri abụo nke ndụ nke ụmụ nwanyị na-arụ ọrụ na mpaghara STEM
